headline.main: Assad Makes Unannounced Trip to Moscow to Discuss Syria With Putin

byline.contributor: Anne Barnard and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Istanbul, and Ivan Nechepurenko from Moscow.

snippet: The leaders talked about their joint military campaign and a future political transition in Syria, a Kremlin spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: The leaders talked about their joint military campaign and a future political transition in Syria, a Kremlin spokesman said.
